IBM Maximo Application Suite v9.0.18¶

Release Notes¶

Bug Fixes and Security Updates¶

  • mobileapi update to update navigator and it's graphite version to v2.13.647 (#4382)
  • Add imgSrc CSP override to allow data url to be used when overriding the login page background image (90x) (#4386)
  • Remove Assist's Watson Discovery dependency (#4121)
  • Update sendmailapi with fix for permission error (#4413)
  • mobileapi update to update navigator and it's graphite version to v2.13.648 (#4424)
  • MASCORE-10785 Fix filebeat command params (#4420)
  • Remove sensitive logs - 90x (#4430)
  • Increase destroy timeout to deal with cluster delays - 9.0.x (#4452)

Install Modes¶

Mode Supported
OwnNamespace True
SingleNamespace True
MultiNamespace False
AllNamespaces False

  • ibm-mas-config-editor
